name: Pertrechado
text: Permanente. Límite de 1 por mazo. Compra esta carta al crear el mazo. Obligado - When your first turn of the game begins: Play any number of [[Objeto]] assets from your hand, reducing the cost of each by 1. During this turn, you have 3 fewer actions to take.

flavor: Sometimes, the only way out is through.
name: Toe to Toe
text: Combatir. This attack deals +1 damage and is automatically successful. As an additional cost to perform this attack, the chosen enemy makes an attack against you.

name: "Get behind me!"
text:
Rápido. Play during any [fast] window.
Until the end of the phase, whenever an enemy would attack another investigator at your location, it attacks you instead, then engages you. Cancel 1 horror dealt by each attack made in this way.

flavor: "You mess wit' one of us, you mess wit' all of us!"
name: Gang Up
text: Combatir. For each different class among cards you control, Recibes+1 [combat] and deal +1 de daño para este ataque.

name: Sweeping Kick
text: Combatir. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed, automatically evade the attacked enemy.

flavor: You slide your feet into position, take a deep breath, and center yourself. They are many, but you are one.
name: Defensive Stance
text: While Defensive Stance is in your hand or committed to a skill test, it gains [combat] icons equal to your [agility], and [agility] icons equal to your [combat].

flavor: In a practiced grip, they are an extension of the empty hand.
name: Butterfly Swords
text: [action]: Combatir. Recibes+1 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. That attack deals +1 damage.

name: Dodge
text:
Rápido. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location.
Cancel that attack. Then, test [agility] (1). If you succeed, deal 1 damage to that enemy.

name: Combat Training
text:
Rápido. Limit 1 [[Compostura]] in play.
Recibes+1 [combat] and +1 [agility].
Non-direct damage/horror must be assigned to Combat Training before it can be assigned to your investigator card.
[fast] Spend 1 resource: Recibes+1 [combat] or +1 [agility] for this skill test.

name: On the Hunt
text: Rápido. Play when you would draw an encounter card during the mythos phase. Instead, search the encounter deck for an enemy, spawn it engaged with you (instead of its normal spawn location), attach On the Hunt to it, and shuffle the encounter deck. [reaction] When you defeat attached enemy: Gain 3 recursos.

flavor: The fangs of Tindalos reach any Presa.
name: Fang of Tyr'thrha
text: Combatir. Choose an enemy at any revealed location as the target for this attack. Before resolving this attack, you may move to that enemy's location. Add your [agility] to your [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +3 damage.

name: Butterfly Swords
text: [action]: Combatir. Recibes+2 [combat] for this attack. After this attack, you may fight again, adding your [agility] to your skill value for that attack. If both attacks are successful, you may exhaust Butterfly Swords to have the second attack deal +1 damage.
